prompts: Create a majestic Pokemon with rainbow-colored antlers and a sleek black body.
I want a mythical creature that radiates light and embodies nature's beauty.
Generate a fairy-type Pokemon that can traverse forests and mountains effortlessly.
Make a legendary Pokemon that has a unique design with vibrant colors and elegant features.
Imagine a graceful creature with the ability to heal others, adorned with colorful accents.
Design a powerful Pokemon known for its connection to life and its mystical abilities.
Show me a rare Pokemon that thrives in magical environments and has a striking appearance.
